title: Pixel 3 XL bug checks when using bluetooth after upgrade to Android 11
content:
I've factory reset the 3 XL and still the problem persists.

I have the phone connected to my car radio via bluetooth. After a few minutes, less the 2 typically, the phone reboots into recovery and the error indicates some type of corruption. Choosing to reboot again the phone reboots.

Had no issues with Android 10.
